title: Ticket #4085: job_ckpt_stack_with_ckpt_server_std can't be run repeatedly
description: job_ckpt_stack_with_ckpt_server_std can't be run repeatedly. It always writes to the same job log file, then reads that log file to determine when the job completes. As a result, after the first successful run, the jobs are considered to have exited immediately, causing other problems.
check_ins: 2013-Nov-19 11:54   Check-in [38754]: job_ckpt_stack_with_ckpt_server_std can now be run repeatedly. #4085 (By Alan De Smet )
